Name: Ink Paper Minesweeper
About the game: Select a category and browse through nine stages of mine-exploring. Each stage unveils a pixelated form of the selected art piece, to the final reveal. The game graphics and animations were mainly created by hand with real paper-work. FEATURES: Base Pack: Edward Penfield Illustrations 13 iconic Penfield's masterpieces Place yourself at the top of the Score Leaderboard Customize your gaming experience with new paper cutouts, patterns and colors. Ink paper minesweeper was made with real paper and digital ink.
